panels.description: This panel does not sort top scores.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    m.attacker AS "Steam ID",
    m.attackerName AS "Name",
    `Wounds`,
    `Kills`,
    `Deaths`,
    `Kills`/`Deaths` AS `K/D`,
    `Revives`
FROM `DBLog_Wounds` m
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
           attacker,
           COUNT(*) AS `Wounds`
    FROM `DBLog_Wounds`
    WHERE
          $__timeFilter(time) AND
          server = $SERVER_ID
    GROUP BY attacker
) w ON w.attacker = m.attacker
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
           attacker,
           COUNT(*) AS `Kills`
    FROM `DBLog_Deaths`
    WHERE
          $__timeFilter(time) AND
          server = $SERVER_ID
    GROUP BY attacker
) k ON k.attacker = m.attacker
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
           victim,
           COUNT(*) AS `Deaths`
    FROM `DBLog_Deaths`
    WHERE
          $__timeFilter(time) AND
          server = $SERVER_ID
    GROUP BY victim
) d ON d.victim = m.attacker
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
           reviver,
           COUNT(*) AS `Revives`
    FROM `DBLog_Revives`
    WHERE
          $__timeFilter(time) AND
          server = $SERVER_ID
    GROUP BY reviver
) r ON r.reviver = m.attacker
    WHERE
          $__timeFilter(time) AND
          server = $SERVER_ID 
GROUP BY m.attacker
HAVING `K/D` IS NOT NULL;

panels.title: Only for search in the top scores - This panel does not sort top scores.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    m.attacker AS "Steam ID",
    m.attackerName AS "Name",
    `Wounds`,
    `Kills`,
    `Deaths`,
    `Kills`/`Deaths` AS `K/D`,
    `Revives`
FROM `DBLog_Wounds` m
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
           attacker,
           COUNT(*) AS `Wounds`
    FROM `DBLog_Wounds`
    WHERE
          $__timeFilter(time) AND
          server = $SERVER_ID
    GROUP BY attacker
) w ON w.attacker = m.attacker
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
           attacker,
           COUNT(*) AS `Kills`
    FROM `DBLog_Deaths`
    WHERE
          $__timeFilter(time) AND
          server = $SERVER_ID
    GROUP BY attacker
) k ON k.attacker = m.attacker
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
           victim,
           COUNT(*) AS `Deaths`
    FROM `DBLog_Deaths`
    WHERE
          $__timeFilter(time) AND
          server = $SERVER_ID
    GROUP BY victim
) d ON d.victim = m.attacker
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
           reviver,
           COUNT(*) AS `Revives`
    FROM `DBLog_Revives`
    WHERE
          $__timeFilter(time) AND
          server = $SERVER_ID
    GROUP BY reviver
) r ON r.reviver = m.attacker
    WHERE
          $__timeFilter(time) AND
          server = $SERVER_ID 
GROUP BY m.attacker
HAVING `K/D` IS NOT NULL;

targets.query: SELECT LAST("tick_rate") FROM "DBLog_TickRates" WHERE server = '$SERVER_ID'
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  tickRate
FROM DBLog_TickRates
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  server = "$SERVER_ID"
ORDER BY time DESC

targets.query:
SELECT 
    mean("tick_rate") 
FROM "DBLog_TickRates" 
WHERE 
    $timeFilter AND
    server = '$SERVER_ID'
GROUP BY time($INTERVAL) fill(null)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  avg(tickRate) AS "tick_rate"
FROM DBLog_TickRates
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  server = "$SERVER_ID"
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(time,$__interval)

targets.query: SELECT LAST("player_count") FROM "DBLog_PlayerCounts" WHERE server = '$SERVER_ID'
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  players AS "Player Count"
FROM DBLog_PlayerCounts
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  server = "$SERVER_ID"
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(time,$__interval) DESC
LIMIT 1

  count(id) AS "id"

targets.query: SELECT count("victimName") FROM "DBLog_Revives" WHERE $timeFilter AND server = '$SERVER_ID'
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  count(id) AS "id"
FROM DBLog_Revives
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  server = "$SERVER_ID"
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(time,$__interval)

SELECT
    a.time AS "Time",
    a.attacker AS "Attacker",
    a.attackerName AS "Attacker Name",
    a.weapon AS "Weapon",
    a.victim AS "Victim",
    a.victimName AS "Victim Name",
    Total AS "Total in Time Frame"
FROM DBLog_Wounds a
JOIN
    (
      SELECT
          attacker,
          COUNT(*) AS "Total"
      FROM DBLog_Wounds
      WHERE 
          $__timeFilter(time) AND
          server = $SERVER_ID AND
          teamkill = true
      GROUP BY attacker
    ) AS b
    ON a.attacker = b.attacker
WHERE 
    $__timeFilter(time) AND
    server = $SERVER_ID AND
    teamkill = true AND
    server = $SERVER_ID
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 30;

SELECT
 layerClassname as "Layer",
 startTime AS "Start Time",
 endTime AS "End Time"
FROM `DBLog_Matches`
WHERE 
    (
        $__timeFilter(startTime) OR 
        $__timeFilter(endTime) OR
        endTime IS NULL
    ) AND 
    server = $SERVER_ID 
ORDER BY startTime DESC;

SELECT
  layerClassname AS metric,
  COUNT(*),
  startTime AS time
FROM `DBLog_Matches`
WHERE
    (
        $__timeFilter(startTime) OR 
        $__timeFilter(endTime) OR
        endTime IS NULL
    ) AND 
    server = $SERVER_ID 
GROUP BY layerClassname

SELECT
  mapClassname AS metric,
  COUNT(*),
  startTime AS time
FROM `DBLog_Matches`
WHERE
    (
        $__timeFilter(startTime) OR 
        $__timeFilter(endTime) OR
        endTime IS NULL
    ) AND 
    server = $SERVER_ID 
GROUP BY mapClassname

targets.query:
SELECT 
    COUNT("victimName") 
FROM "DBLog_Wounds" 
WHERE 
    $timeFilter AND
    server = '$SERVER_ID' AND
    teamkill = false
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$__interval),
  weapon AS metric,
  count(id) AS "Wounds"
FROM DBLog_Wounds
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  server = "$SERVER_ID"
GROUP BY 2
ORDER BY count(id) DESC

SELECT DISTINCTROW
  layer,
  NTH_VALUE(LW.winner, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY LW.layer) AS "Most Frequent Winner",
  NTH_VALUE(LW.wins, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY LW.layer) AS "Most Frequent Winner Wins",
  (NTH_VALUE(LW.wins, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY LW.layer) / (NTH_VALUE(LW.wins, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY LW.layer) + NTH_VALUE(LW.wins, 2) OVER (PARTITION BY LW.layer))) * 100 AS "Most Frequent Winner Win Percentage",
  NTH_VALUE(LW.winner, 2) OVER (PARTITION BY LW.layer) AS "Least Frequent Winner",
  NTH_VALUE(LW.wins, 2) OVER (PARTITION BY LW.layer) AS "Least Frequent Winner Count",
  (NTH_VALUE(LW.wins, 2) OVER (PARTITION BY LW.layer) / (NTH_VALUE(LW.wins, 1) OVER (PARTITION BY LW.layer) + NTH_VALUE(LW.wins, 2) OVER (PARTITION BY LW.layer))) * 100 AS "Least Frequent Winner Win Percentage"
FROM (
  SELECT
    M.layer,
    M.winner,
    COUNT(*) AS "wins"
  FROM dblog_matches M
  WHERE
    M.layer IS NOT NULL AND
    M.winner IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY M.layer, M.winner
  ORDER BY wins DESC
) LW;
